abstract: Reports showed deepening trouble in the housing market even as the Fed found little evidence that the turmoil had damaged the wider economy.
snippet: Reports showed deepening trouble in the housing market even as the Fed found little evidence that the turmoil had damaged the wider economy.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell yesterday as investors were unsettled by reports that showed the troubles in the housing market were deepening even as a Federal Reserve survey of regional conditions found little evidence of the turmoil’s having damaged other parts of the economy.

headline.main: Stocks Slip as Fed Says Credit Crisis Is Contained
headline.print_headline: Stocks Slip As Fed Says Credit Crisis Is Contained

byline.original: By Vikas Bajaj and Edmund L. Andrews
